law.text: As used in KRS 454.405 to 454.415, "inmate" means any person confined in either a state or federally operated facility, a county jail or other facility of local government, or in a private facility under contract with the Department of Corrections.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996.
